name: Mechanic Heroes Demo
description:
Freshly graduated, you and your team of mechanics must work together to repair as many cars as possible before your shift ends. Take part in an intense adventure, recruit the best mechanics and become true mechanic heroes together!





Playable with up to 4 players. In local and/or online multiplayer, work together to get the highest score and unlock new levels and characters.






Get ready to become an elite mechanic! Change the wheels, repair the body of the car or change the battery, car maintenance will no longer have any secrets for you!





PHYSICS!

Forget the safety rules and save time with hero physics. Throw tools, wheels or batteries, it's much more convenient!







Travel the world, discover unique environments and complete complex tasks that will push your coordination skills to the limit.

Over 25 levels for you and your team to discover and master!




COMPETITIVES RACES!

Play against your friends in a competitive racing mode, because a team of mechanics always needs a driving champion!
